### Request an app

Don't see a web app you need? We're constantly adding new ones to Zapier based
on customer requests.

Email us the apps you'd like added today!

### Add an app

Add an app to Zapier yourself! Our developer platform lets you create triggers
and actions people can use to automate and integrate your app with hundreds of
others.

Go to the developer platform

### Get updates

Stay up-to-date with new apps and features as they become available on Zapier.

Go to the Updates Blog

Blog Post

## How to create a custom AI chatbot with Zapier Interfaces

  * 

Read More

# Top AI Tools Apps

## 1 - 22 of 145 AI Tools apps by most popular

  * ### ChatGPT

### ChatGPT

ChatGPT is an AI tool built by OpenAI that enables conversational automation.
A more powerful OpenAI integration is available here:
https://zapier.com/apps/openai/integrations

  * ### OpenAI (GPT-3, DALL-E, Whisper)

### OpenAI (GPT-3, DALL-E, Whisper)

From the makers of ChatGPT, the OpenAI integration for GPT-3, DALL·E, or
Whisper. Build AI powered workflows with OpenAI’s powerful models. An
optimized ChatGPT integration is available here:
https://zapier.com/apps/chatgpt/integrations

  * ### Mem

### Mem

Mem is a tool to capture, share, and access information from anywhere.

  * ### Browse AI

### Browse AI

Browse AI is a web automation tool that lets you extract and monitor data from
any website with no code.

  * ### Seamless AI

### Seamless AI

Seamless AI is a real-time B2B Sales search engine to find leads using the
power of AI.

  * ### ChatBot

### ChatBot

ChatBot is a universal and comprehensive framework for building modern AI
chatbots. It can be used by total beginners as well as advanced developers.

  * ### Read AI

### Read AI

Read AI makes meetings more effective and efficient with AI generated
summaries, highlights, transcripts, and video playback for Zoom, Google Meet,
and Teams.

  * ### Grain

### Grain

Grain joins your calls to take notes, document the next steps, and file
automated meeting notes in platforms like Slack, HubSpot, and more.

  * ### Fathom

### Fathom

beta

Fathom combines an AI meeting assistant that improves the productivity of your
team with a conversational intelligence platform.

  * ### Chatbase

### Chatbase

With Chatbase, you can create a custom GPT chatbot that knows your data.
Upload a pdf or a link and get a chatbot that has the info on it.

Featured

Google MakerSuite

Google MakerSuite is a fast, easy way to start prototyping generative AI ideas
using Google's PaLM model.

##

  * ### Descript

### Descript

Descript is a tool for getting accurate, fast, and affordable automatic
transcriptions of your audio and video media. Once your media is transcribed,
you can also edit the text - media word processing.

  * ### HeyGen

### HeyGen

Meet HeyGen - The best AI video generation platform for your team.

  * ### Copy.ai

### Copy.ai

100x productivity without sacrificing an ounce of quality in your brand’s
voice, style, and authority.

  * ### Supernormal

### Supernormal

Supernormal delivers detailed meeting notes automatically, saving you time and
effort spent writing, polishing, and sharing notes.

  * ### CustomGPT

### CustomGPT

CustomGPT builds your own AI-powered chatbot with your business content. Easy,
no-code platform used by total beginners as well as advanced developers.

  * ### Synthesia

### Synthesia

Video drives action. Now you can automatically enrich all your transactional
emails with personalized videos from Synthesia.

  * ### Feathery

### Feathery

Feathery is a powerful form builder for product teams.

  * ### Personal AI

### Personal AI

Personal AI, your digital mind for enhanced living. Unlock AI's power as it
recalls memories and engages in meaningful conversations.

  * ### Growbots

### Growbots

Growbots is an all-in-one AI tool for automated outbound sales, combining
scalable prospecting and targeted email outreach.

  * ### Cody

### Cody

Cody is an intelligent AI assistant like ChatGPT – with the added benefit of
being able to train it on your business, processes with your own knowledge
base.

  * ### Zapier Chatbots

beta

### Zapier Chatbots

beta

Create custom AI chatbots and take action with built-in automation

  * ### Anthropic (Claude)

### Anthropic (Claude)

Claude by Anthropic is an AI assistant trained for safety and conversational
understanding.

# Flexible plans for growing businesses of all sizes

## Workflow automation plans

Whether you're automating for the first time or scaling automation across your
business, we have flexible plans that meet your needs today and tomorrow.

Pay monthlyPay yearly (Save 33%)

Pay yearly (Save 33%)

USD $

# How many tasks do you need?

100

2K

10K

100K

1M

2M

Select a task tier

Learn about tasks

## Free

For individuals starting out with automation.

$

0

USD/mo

Free forever

Try it free

Free plan features:

Two-step Zaps

Two-step Zaps have one trigger (e.g., new email lead) and one action (e.g.,
add to my CRM).

Visual editor

Build and edit Zaps in our visual, drag-and-drop editor.

Unlimited Zaps

No matter what plan you choose, you can create as many Zaps as your task limit
allows.

## Starter

For individuals who need to automatically move data between apps.

Starting from

$

19

.99

USD/mo

Billed annually

Try it free

Everything in Free, plus:

Multi-step Zaps

Multi-step Zaps let a single trigger (e.g., new email lead) perform as many
actions as you want (e.g., add to my CRM and message my team).

Zapier data tools

Zapier offers a variety of data apps in the App Directory that help you add
conditional logic, format data, schedule Zap runs, and much more.

Zap versions

Save multiple versions and recover previous versions of your Zaps. Starter: 1
week, Pro: 1 month, Team: 6 months, Company: 1 year.

## Professional

For individuals building and managing custom workflows.

Starting from

$

49

USD/mo

Billed annually

Try it free

Everything in Starter, plus:

Conditional Zaps

Build advanced workflows with Paths by Zapier to run different actions based
on conditions you set.

Advanced Zap settings

Take more control of how your Zap functions with Error Ratio Settings,
Customized Polling Intervals, Flood Protection settings, and Custom Error
Notifications.

Unlimited Premium apps

Premium apps are select apps exclusively available to users on paid plans.

## Team

For teams turning business processes into automated workflows.

Starting from

$

69

USD/mo

Billed annually

Try it free

Contact Sales

Everything in Professional, plus:

Unlimited users

A user can build and edit a Zap.

Shared app connections

Connect your team’s favorite tools so everyone can use them in their workflows
without needing to share passwords and API keys

Shared workspace

Share access to your Zaps with your team.

Premier Support

Get faster, prioritized responses from our dedicated Premier Support team.

## Company

For companies scaling automation across teams.

Contact Sales

Everything in Team, plus:

SAML single sign-on (SSO)

Ensure secure access for your team using SAML 2.0 identity and access
management (IAM) providers.

Advanced admin permissions

Add unlimited teams to your account to better manage workspace-level
permissions.

Custom data retention

Customize your task history retention to match your company's legal and
regulatory requirements.

## Our commitment to flexible, risk-free pricing

### Your plan, your way

Pick any task tier, and if you reach your limit, you can switch to pay-as-you-
go until you’re ready for a higher tier.  

### More valuable as you grow

The higher the task tier, the lower the cost per task. No matter which plan
you choose, you'll get more value the more you use Zapier.  

### Commit and save

Commit to annual payments for a lower monthly fee. Or talk with our Sales team
for access to deeper discounts on our Company plan.  

## Compare plans and features

Team

Company

Usage| Free| Starter| Professional| Team| Company|

Team

|

Company

| Team| Company  
---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---  
Zaps

Two-step Zaps have one trigger and one action (e.g., a new email lead is
automatically added to your CRM). Multi-step Zaps have one trigger that
prompts multiple actions (e.g., a single email lead is automatically added to
your CRM and notifies your team in Slack).

| Two-step| Multi-step| Multi-step| Multi-step| Multi-step| Multi-step| Multi-
step  
Premium apps

Premium apps are select apps that are exclusively available to users on paid
plans.

| 0| 3| Unlimited| Unlimited| Unlimited| Unlimited| Unlimited  
Users

Add unlimited users to your account at no additional cost.

| 1| 1| 1| Unlimited| Unlimited| Unlimited| Unlimited  
Update time

How often Zapier checks for new data to start your Zap.

| 15 min| 15 min| 2 min| 1 min| 1 min| 1 min| 1 min  
Tables BasicNew

Store, edit, and collaborate on data that powers your Zaps. Connect Zaps to
your tables and data with confidence.

| | | | | | |  
Overage tasks

If you exceed your plan’s task limit, you’ll automatically switch to pay-per-
task billing for the remainder of your pay period so your Zaps stay on. Each
task above your plan’s limit will cost 1.25x the cost of a task on your base
subscription.

| | | | | | |  
  
See more features

## Join 2.2 million businesses using Zapier to grow their business

# Frequently asked questions

### Zapier overview

Do I need to know how to code?

What are apps?

What is a Zap?

What are tasks?

What is a trigger?

What's the difference between Zaps, triggers, actions, and tasks?

Does checking (or polling) for new data use tasks?

How many tasks do I need?

What happens if I hit my task limit?

Will I be charged a task for any of Zapier’s built-in data tools?

How many connections does Zapier support?

### Plans and payments

Should I use the Team or Company plan?

Which plans allow for unlimited users?

Do you have a free trial of your premium features?

Can I change my plan later?

What if I decide to cancel?

Do you offer any discounts?

Can you charge me in my local currency?

Can I pay via invoice or wire transfer?

### Sales and support

Do you have a Sales team?

What level of support do Team and Company plans get?

What if I have more questions?
